headline.main: Excitement of Enemy People It Produced Viewed as Factor for Conduct of War

lead_paragraph: The roar of American planes over Japan, which has now made Brig. Gen. "Jimmy" Doolittle and his seventy-nine companions the newest American heroes of the air, may some day provide an ominous threnody to Japanese hopes of empire.
abstract: H W Baldwin on U S raid on Japan led by Brig Gen Doolittle
snippet: The roar of American planes over Japan, which has now made Brig. Gen. "Jimmy" Doolittle and his seventy-nine companions the newest American heroes of the air, may some day provide an ominous threnody to Japanese hopes of empire....
